text: United Nations General Assembly Resolution 36/3 was adopted on September 25, 1981 to admit Belize to membership in the United Nations.http://research.un.org/en/docs/ga/quick/regular/36 The resolution was adopted by a majority of 144 members with Guatemala opposing and 10 not voting. == Voting Results == The result of the voting was the following: {| class="sortable wikitable" |-
